panels.description: This pie chart shows the latest status of all requirements included in the control file.

panels.description: This chart shows the status history of all requirements included in the control file.

panels.description: All requirements included in the policy. If the policy contains different levels, the number will represent the number of requirements in selected level.
panels.title: all requirements

panels.description: Assessed requirements are all requirements not in "pending" status. It means they were already assessed and properly classified.

targets.expr: sum by (level) (policy_requirements_status_anssi{level="minimal", status="assessed"}) / sum by (level) (policy_requirements_status_anssi{level="minimal", status="all"}) * 100

panels.title: assessed

panels.description:
All applicable requirements included in the policy. If the policy contains different levels, the number will represent the number of requirements in selected level.

Some policies may include requirements for different components but make them optional or applicable only in some specific circumstances.
panels.title: applicable requirements

panels.description:
full coverage includes all requirements in the following status:
- automated
- documentation
- inherently_met
- manual

For more detailed information, check the utils/controleval.py tool in ComplianceAsCode/content repository.

targets.expr: sum by (level) (policy_requirements_status_anssi{level="minimal", status="full coverage"}) / sum by (level) (policy_requirements_status_anssi{level="minimal", status="all"}) * 100
